entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Wingham
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:17 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 12:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 85 %

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then rain. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 70 in the afternoon. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers in the evening. A few flurries beginning late in the evening. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
